name: cypress-practice

scripts.test: npm run pretest && npx cypress run  --reporter-options=reportFilename=OrangeHRM Report
scripts.test-windows: npm run pretest-windows && npx cypress run cypress/e2e/Orange  --reporter-options=reportFilename=OrangeHRM Report --browser chrome
scripts.ci-test: npm run pretest && npx cypress run cypress/e2e/Orange/*.js --browser chrome

author: Raffy Rodriguez, Alfredo Polanco & Edgar Ysabel
